s0001: Zhao Gong Shi with Zhou same surname, surname Ji.
s0002: Zhou Wu Wang's extinguished Zhou, enfeoffed Zhao Gong at north Yan.
s0003: His in Cheng Wang time, Zhao Gong made three dukes: from Xia west, Zhao Gong governed it;
s0004: from Xia east, Zhou Gong governed it.
s0005: Cheng Wang already young, Zhou Gong acted government, held country ascended throne, Zhao Gong doubted him, made Jun Shi.
s0006: Jun Shi not pleased Zhou Gong.
s0007: Zhou Gong then said 'Tang time had Yi Yin, relied on August Heaven;
s0008: in Tai Wu time, then had like Yi Zhi, Chen Hu, relied on Shang Di, Wu Xian governed Wang family;
s0009: in Zu Yi time, then had like Wu Xian;
s0010: in Wu Ding time, then had like Gan Pan: led only this had array, protected peace had Yin'.
s0012: Zhao Gong's governing western, very obtained common people harmony.
s0013: Zhao Gong patrolled rural cities, had paulownia tree, decided prison government affairs under it, from marquises earls to commoners each obtained their place, no lost duty.
s0014: Zhao Gong died, people thought Zhao Gong's government, cherished paulownia tree dared not cut, sang recited it, made Gan Tang poem.
s0015: From Zhao Gong below nine generations to Hui Hou.
s0016: Yan Hui Hou during Zhou Li Wang fled Zhu, republican administered government time.
s0017: Hui Hou died, son Xi Hou established.
s0018: This year, Zhou Xuan Wang initially ascended position.
s0019: Xi Hou twenty-first year, Zheng Huan Gong initially enfeoffed at Zheng.
s0020: Thirty-sixth year, Xi Hou died, son Qing Hou established.
s0021: Qing Hou twentieth year, Zhou You Wang lewd chaos, for Quan Rong assassinated.
s0022: Qin began ranked as feudal lords.
s0023: Twenty-fourth year, Qing Hou died, son Ai Hou established.
s0024: Ai Hou second year died, son Zheng Hou established.
s0025: Zheng Hou thirty-sixth year died, son Mu Hou established.
s0026: Mu Hou seventh year, Ru Yin Gong first year.
s0027: Eighteenth year died, son Xuan Hou established.
s0028: Xuan Hou thirteenth year died, son Huan Hou established.
s0029: Huan Hou seventh year died, son Zhuang Gong established.
s0030: Zhuang Gong twelfth year, Qi Huan Gong began hegemon.
s0031: Sixteenth year, with Song, Wei together attacked Zhou Hui Wang, Hui Wang went fleeing Wen, established Hui Wang younger brother Sui as Zhou Wang.
s0032: Seventeenth year, Zheng captured Yan Zhong Fu entered Hui Wang to Zhou.
s0033: Twenty-seventh year, Shan Rong came invaded us, Qi Huan Gong saved Yan, then north attacked Shan Rong returned.
s0034: Yan lord sent Qi Huan Gong out border, Huan Gong because cut Yan arrived place gave Yan, made Yan together tribute heavenly son, like Cheng Zhou time duty;
s0035: made Yan again repair Zhao Gong's method.
s0036: Thirty-third year died, son Xiang Gong established.
s0037: Xiang Gong twenty-sixth year, Jin Wen Gong for Jian Tu assembly, called hegemon.
s0038: Thirty-first year, Qin troops defeated at Xiao.
s0039: Thirty-seventh year, Qin Mu Gong died.
s0040: Fortieth year, Xiang Gong died, Huan Gong established.
s0041: Huan Gong sixteenth year died, Xuan Gong established.
s0042: Xuan Gong fifteenth year died, Zhao Gong established.
s0043: Zhao Gong thirteenth year died, Wu Gong established.
s0044: This year Jin extinguished three Xi grand masters.
s0045: Wu Gong nineteenth year died, Wen Gong established.
s0046: Wen Gong sixth year died, Yi Gong established.
s0047: Yi Gong first year, Qi Cui Zhu assassinated their lord Zhuang Gong.
s0048: Fourth year died, son Hui Gong established.
s0049: Hui Gong first year, Qi Gao Zhi came flee.
